column4: can anyone explain to me why my toshiba netbook nb200 seems to report a battery live of 2 hours yet reviews state it should last 5+ hours.  Could it be because ubuntu just doesnt know how to make the system efficient?
No, your battery life is being reported accurately, it is just that ubuntu (and other gnu/linux distros) suck at making your battery last a long time
(also my prior comment was meant for you)
